body.p: i received your letter to day thursday Thursday with the money all right i thought it was a goner as i dident didn't get it yesterday i couldent couldn't hardley hardly give it up yesterday as you wrote in your fridays Friday's letter i would get your letter on wensday Wednesday but it come to day very welcome

mrMr. Burrous Burroughs has not been to see me i was exspecting expecting him every day after you wrote
but he dident didn't come) i have not heard from jeffJeff nor mattyMatty since i wrote last to you) eddEdd said the letter man asked him to day why his mother dident didn't get any more letters i used to get so many mattyMatty used to write quite often and Jeffy once in a while but they have all seemed to fall off) but the good old standby if he should fail me i should have nothing to look for but i gess guess there is no danger is there walterWalter dear as long as you have your old mamma i often think how loth many is to have children and what would become of me if i had none
Janey mc clureMcClure that is nanc s Nancy's brothers brother's wife was here the other day she came to see if cornellCornell had been to see me about the children she sends them the most saucy letters they think if they should doo do any thinkthing she would not be any too good to kill her brother Edd thats that's the one in the new court house) i have come to the conclusion there is but one way to doo do and that is to send them to the nursery to flatbushFlatbush there is no institution in the city that they would be taken as they are janeyJaney thinks that is the only place that she couldent couldn't get them out i cant can't begin to tell and i dont don't want too half the worse that wreched wretched woman does i dont don't know walterWalter how you feel about their being taken there but i know that i should feel much better than to have them sent out begging it would be no disgrace as there is many there that is of good parentage there they would be clothed and fed if they ever can be cleaned janeyJaney says the they are so dirty that you would not know they were ever clean

postscript.p: i am about the same as usual feel quite smart at times
they are digging the cellar at georges George's lot he had it survayed surveyed yesterday
